==Profile==
Asagiri is a freelance illustrator who draws light novel illustrations for the [[Yae Publishing House]], including illustrations for [[Fukumoto (King of Invokations)|Fukumoto]]'s light novel [[King of Invokations (Book)|King of Invokations]]. Miss Moriko is the executive editor in charge of her work.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens: Greenery Chapter (Quest)}}</ref> Besides light novels, she has also illustrated various other things, such as a character for a scientific publication<ref>Event [[Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens: Greenery Chapter]] Stage: ''[[Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens/2022-11-16#Historia Naturalis Sumeru|Historia Naturalis Sumeru]]''</ref> and various promotional materials for [[Xavier]]'s film {{LL|"The Seventh Samurai"|.}}<ref>Event [[Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens/2022-04-01|Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens]] Stage: ''The Seventh Samurai''</ref><ref>Event [[Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens: Greenery Chapter]] Stage: ''[[Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens/2022-11-16#The Seventh Samurai|The Seventh Samurai]]''</ref>

===Appearance===
Asagiri has long black hair and fair skin, and wears a light blue kimono patterned with pink sakura flowers and a dark blue obi.
